document.full_text: buffalo's tyler ennis fired in his second goal of the game in overtime to give the sabres a 4-3 road win at the philadelphia flyers in the nhl playoffs on friday.
document.title: sabres, predators scratch 4-3 ot road wins
lines_and_colors: buffalo's tyler ennis fired in his second goal of the game in overtime to give the sabres a 4-3 road win at the philadelphia flyers in the nhl playoffs on friday.
